traits.label: ratio
traits.name: :ratio
traits.desc: Force the component to maintain an aspect ratio

traits.label: src
traits.name: :src
traits.desc: Path to image

traits.label: srcset
traits.name: :srcset
traits.desc: Same syntax as srcset attribute

traits.label: sizes
traits.name: :sizes
traits.desc: Same syntax as sizes attribute

traits.label: placeholder-src
traits.name: :placeholder-src
traits.desc: While waiting for your image to load, you can use a placeholder image

traits.label: initial-ratio
traits.name: :initial-ratio
traits.desc: Use it when not specifying 'ratio' but still wanting an initial aspect ratio

traits.label: width
traits.name: :width
traits.desc: Forces image width; Must also include the unit (px or %)

traits.label: height
traits.name: :height
traits.desc: Forces image height; Must also include the unit (px or %)

traits.label: loading
traits.name: :loading
traits.desc: Lazy or immediate load; Same syntax as loading attribute

traits.label: crossorigin
traits.name: :crossorigin
traits.desc: Same syntax as crossorigin attribute

traits.label: decoding
traits.name: :decoding
traits.desc: Same syntax as decoding attribute

traits.label: referrerpolicy
traits.name: :referrerpolicy
traits.desc: Same syntax as referrerpolicy attribute

traits.label: fetchpriority
traits.name: :fetchpriority
traits.desc: Provides a hint of the relative priority to use when fetching the image

traits.label: fit
traits.name: :fit
traits.desc: How the image will fit into the container; Equivalent of the object-fit prop; Can be coordinated with 'position' prop

traits.label: position
traits.name: :position
traits.desc: The alignment of the image into the container; Equivalent of the object-position CSS prop

traits.label: alt
traits.name: :alt
traits.desc: Specifies an alternate text for the image, if the image cannot be displayed

traits.label: draggable
traits.name: :draggable
traits.desc: Adds the native 'draggable' attribute

traits.label: img-class
traits.name: :img-class
traits.desc: CSS classes to be attributed to the native img element

traits.label: img-style
traits.name: :img-style
traits.desc: Apply CSS to the native img element

traits.label: spinner-color
traits.name: :spinner-color
traits.desc: Color name for default Spinner (unless using a 'loading' slot)

traits.label: spinner-size
traits.name: :spinner-size
traits.desc: Size in CSS units, including unit name, for default Spinner (unless using a 'loading' slot)

traits.label: no-spinner
traits.name: :no-spinner
traits.desc: Do not display the default spinner while waiting for the image to be loaded; It is overriden by the 'loading' slot when one is present

traits.label: no-native-menu
traits.name: :no-native-menu
traits.desc: Disables the native context menu for the image

traits.label: no-transition
traits.name: :no-transition
traits.desc: Disable default transition when switching between old and new image
